Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Sacramento/Ogden
ShortDescription: EB 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, Kedzie, Roosevelt and Western due to, street blockage near Sacramento/Ogden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 16th, Kedzie, Roosevelt and Western due to, street blockage near Sacramento/Ogden.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/16th
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Cermak, Western, Roosevelt anf California due to, street blockage near California/16th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Cermak, Western, Roosevelt and California due to, street blockage near California/16th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Southport
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between the Loop and Southport at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Kimball and Southport.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
